#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long i,n,m,x,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        x=n*m;
        if(x%2==0)
        {
            cout<<"1/2"<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<(x-1)/2<<"/"<<x<<endl;
        }
        
    }
return(0);
}
